General.Name: Huddlestock Fintech As
General.Description: Huddlestock Fintech AS, a fintech company, develops and implements software as a service-solutions for custody banks, asset managers, and trading venues. It offers digital boarding, client communication, reporting, order execution, and portfolio management services; business analysis, software design, and development and project management services; and financial consultancy and technology services. The company also operates Bedrock, a connectivity SaaS API platform for online trading and brokerage; and Apex platform to provide wealth tech solutions. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Stavanger, Norway.

5.Name: Mr. Nith  Vegaya
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Huddlestock Asia Sdn Bhd.
